title: Sponsored: Striking a Transformative Tone with Dan Helfrich
description:
Dan Helfrich, CEO of Deloitte Consulting, joins Let’s Workflow It to talk about reinventing the consulting industry by bringing together a diverse set of problem solvers. Dan envisions an exciting future where agile, inclusive work environments empower individuals to challenge the status quo. He’s a big believer that the tone from the top can promote change from the bottom, unlocking value company wide.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
